tha-ap150:0.3_0: As a result, fruit of good and bad,
tha-ap150:1.1_0: I used to be in the past
tha-ap150:1.3_0: Having made the moon in a jackal,
tha-ap150:1.4_0: and gave him the world following world.
tha-ap150:2.1_0: Blue, I speak such a thing
tha-ap150:3.1_0: And there are mansions and palanquins
tha-ap150:3.4_0: This is the fruit of fruit.
tha-ap150:4.3_0: I’m not aware of any bad places
tha-ap150:4.4_0: This is the fruit of fruit.
tha-ap150:5.2_0: they fall into the four bridges!
tha-ap150:6.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
tha-ap150:7.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Bakkula.
tha-ap150:8.1_0: The eighth part of the senior’s fruit,
